provider.name: BIS TV
provider.servicehacks:
# Some HD services are not properly identified as such by service_type or by name. hd_services = ( 'RTL9', 'TREK', 'Science et Vie', 'AB MOTEURS', 'ACTION', )
if service["service_type"] == 1 and (service["service_name"][-3:] == ' HD' or service["service_name"] in hd_services): service["service_type"] = 25
